mapper.select: SELECT count(itemNo) FROM item WHERE itemType LIKE '%' || #{keywordTitle} || '%' AND (itemName LIKE '%' || #{keywordDesc} || '%' OR itemDesc LIKE '%' || #{keywordDesc} || '%') ORDER BY itemNo DESC

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, itemNo, itemName, itemPrice, itemStock, itemType, itemRegDate, itemMainPic, itemSubPic, itemDesc, itemStatus FROM ( SELECT * FROM item WHERE itemType LIKE '%' || #{keywordTitle} || '%' AND (itemName LIKE '%' || #{keywordDesc} || '%' OR itemDesc LIKE '%' || #{keywordDesc} || '%' ) ORDER BY itemNo DESC )) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{sizePerPage}*#{page}-#{sizePerPage}+1 and #{sizePerPage}*#{page}
SELECT * FROM item WHERE itemStatus = 'OPEN' ORDER BY itemRegDate DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO item (itemNo, itemName, itemPrice, itemStock, itemType, itemRegDate, itemMainPic, itemSubPic, itemDesc, itemStatus) VALUES (itemNo_seq.nextVal, #{itemName}, #{itemPrice}, #{itemStock}, #{itemType}, SYSDATE, #{itemMainPic}, #{itemSubPic}, #{itemDesc}, #{itemStatus})
mapper.update: UPDATE item SET itemName=#{itemName}, itemPrice=#{itemPrice}, itemStock=#{itemStock}, itemType=#{itemType}, itemMainPic=#{itemMainPic}, itemSubPic=#{itemSubPic}, itemDesc=#{itemDesc} WHERE itemNo=#{itemNo}
UPDATE item SET itemStatus= CASE WHEN itemStatus = 'CLOSED' THEN 'OPEN' WHEN itemStatus = 'OPEN' THEN 'CLOSED' END WHERE itemNo=#{itemNo}
mapper.select: SELECT itemMainPic FROM item WHERE itemNo = #{itemNo}
SELECT itemSubPic FROM item WHERE itemNo = #{itemNo}
SELECT * FROM item WHERE itemType LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' ORDER BY itemNo
SELECT * FROM item WHERE itemName LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' ORDER BY itemNo
SELECT * FROM item WHERE itemType = #{itemType} ORDER BY itemNo
